local_intent: Close the gripper to secure the grasp after moving to the precomputed grasp pose, then verify stability.
assumptions: goal_pose has been computed for the brown_object and is valid
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp subphase around CloseGripper from the global tree: checks pose availability, moves to the pinch grasp pose, closes with force 20 and timeout 1000, then verifies IsGraspStable.
